Cue Mobile App

A few friends and I founded Cue while at BDW. It's a social app that introduces you to people in your immediate vicinity based on matching customizable tags through BLE. The design is deliberately open-ended to allow the app to be used for many purposes - most obviously in a social sense.

Although Cue never ultimately launched, we built and tested awesome prototypes and garnered coverage along the way.
